name: Neon One: IQ Brain Puzzle
description: The ultimate one-line drawing challenge of 2025! Master your logic with Neon One, a minimalist brain training puzzle. Connect all the dots with a single continuous line. Featuring thousands of procedurally generated neon levels, satisfying haptic feedback, and relaxing ambient sounds. Test your IQ and sharpen your mind daily. No WiFi required - play offline anywhere. Perfect for fans of geometry puzzles and brain games.
short_description: Can you draw it in one touch? Addictive neon logic puzzle for IQ training.
